task.title: Map test cases between and TestRail

taskbody.context: To map a test case between and TestRail, you need to get the TestRail test case ID. Do as follows:

step.cmd: To retrieve the TestRail test case ID, open your project in TestRail, then go to the Test Cases tab.
step.info: Here you can see the list of test cases and their IDs.

step.cmd: Open the test case you want to map, switch to the Integration tab, and specify the respective test case ID in TestRail (only the integer part).

image.alt: Specify test case ID in Studio

taskbody.result: You have successfully map test cases between and TestRail.
